NAME.Nominative: Apostle Hermas of the Seventy († 1<sup>st</sup> C)

LIFE.Copyright: The Clergyman’s Handbook. Moscow. 1978. English translation Copyright 1997 Fr. S. Janos.

SAINT.LIFE: The Holy Disciple Hermas was a bishop in Thracian Philippopolis. The holy Apostle Paul greets him in the Epistle to the Romans ( Rom. 16: 14). Preaching the Gospel, the Disciple Hermas endured much grief from the pagans, but he died peacefully.
